posts.author: TheSquid
posts.content: I was playing a PDK in a group, and idly spamming Heroic Shield while waiting for the last member. At some point I noticed that there was a counter on the icon, as if the number of uses per day were not infinite. It must have appeared at some point, it definitely is not there when I rest, and only appears after several uses. Anyone knows what's going on? Might be a WoG thing as the ability is changed there, but I thought only in duration.

posts.author: Mick Dagger
posts.content: As far as I know, Heroic Shield lasts one round and can be used once per round unlimited, so I don't know why there is a counter. Maybe you should ask in the WoG forums.

posts.author: webshaman1
posts.content: It's a WoG thing - due to the duration change, etc.

posts.author: TheSquid
posts.content:
OK I tested in PGCC, and it happens there too. It's not actually unlimited.


There is a counter counting *attempted* uses, not even successful ones. Not sure how high it starts (as it does not show above 99!), maybe 200?
